Norton internet security 2012 removed splash pro.exe & show a message that it is not safe!!! I download direct from their website & serial in text file and it work fine!!! the original file which I download direct from developer site is "15.81 mb(without zip format)" and your have upload "21.46(with zip format)

what you messed with that???
see on site the size is 21.9 MB. I haven't mess any thing with file. Trust me

see on site the size is 21.9 MB. I haven't mess any thing with file. Trust me

the file you download was "Splash PRO - The ultimate HD player"

and the file i have given you is "Splash PRO EX"
so there is difference between them
anyway thanx for the support!!! but you may scan your file at virus total if you think i m trolling....
Can someone tell why any of the best video player in the market (VLC, WMP, MPC-HC don't support subtitles for mp4 files?

1 - Install "splash_pro_ex_1_13_0_setup.exe" and close the utility once the installation is complete.
2 - Shut off your Internet connection settings in Windows.
3 - In the settings of your firewall active (Windows or your anti-virus), prevent access to the internet to complete the application Splash Pro EX).
4 - Run the application "Splash PRO EX" normally from the desktop icon.
5 - In the application, enter a name for the license key and paste a file "Serials.txt."
6 - Turn your Internet connection settings in Windows.
7 - Restart the computer, if necessary.
8 - Enjoy!
